 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְבוֺ‎</span> **proper name, of a location** (probably connection, at least for **2**, with (Babylonian) god ***Nebo, Nabû***, compare II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְבוֺ‎</span> and [[BDB#Bae|Bae]]<sup>Rel. 15. 89, 259</sup>; yet not certain, [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xiii. 1888, 470</sup> compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***the height***, etc.): [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">Ναβαυ</span>; — 

**1. a.** ==city in Moab== [[Num.32.3|Num 32:3]]; [[Num.32.38|Num 32:38]] (where assigned to Reuben; both [[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]] = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נבה‎</span> [[BDB#MI|MI]]<sup>14</sup>) [[Isa.15.2|Isa 15:2]]; [[Jer.48.1|Jer 48:1]]; [[Jer.48.22|Jer 48:22]]; [[1Chr.5.8|1Chr 5:8]] probably on or near Mt. Nebo (see below), compare [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Geogr. 266 f.</sup> [[BDB#Tristr|Tristr]]<sup>Moab 338.</sup> 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** city in Judah, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּנֵי נ‎</span> [[Ezra.2.29|Ezra 2:29]] = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַחֵר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַנְשֵׁי נ‎</span> [[Neh.7.34|Neh 7:34]] (***the men of the other N.***, so distinguished — si <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אחר‎</span> vera l., compare Ryle — from **a** ==? or from another== <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹב‎</span> ?), [[Ezra.10.43|Ezra 10:43]] — this <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נבו‎</span> in Judah perhaps = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹב‎</span> **1** q. v. 

**2.** mountain in Moab, where Moses died [[Num.33.47|Num 33:47]]; [[Deut.32.49|Deut 32:49]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַרנְֿבוֺ‎</span>), [[Deut.34.1|Deut 34:1]] (***id.***; all [[BDB#P|P]]), six miles west of Heshbon according to Onomastica (ed. [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>283</sup>). Probably = modern ***Nebâ*** at northeast corner of Dead Sea, [[BDB#Survey|Survey]]<sup>E. Pal. i. 198 ff.</sup> [[BDB#GASm|GASm]]<sup>Geogr. 562 ff.</sup> [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Geogr. 266 f.</sup> [[BDB#Tristr|Tristr]]<sup>Moab 318, 338</sup> Merrill<sup>East of Jordan, 242 ff.</sup> — compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּסְגָּה‎</span>. 



 II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְבוֺ‎</span> **proper name, of a divinity** ==Nebo== (loan-word in Hebrew, compare Phoenician proper name, masculine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נבו‎</span>; = Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***Nabû***</u></abbr>, [[BDB#Schr|Schr]]<sup>COT Glossary and [[Isa.46.1|Isa 46:1]]</sup> [[BDB#Jastr|Jastr]]<sup>Rel. Babylonian 124 ff.</sup> [[BDB#Jen|Jen]]<sup>Kosmol. pass.</sup> [[BDB#Tiele|Tiele]]<sup>Ass. u. Babylonian Geach. 532 f.</sup> [[BDB#Say|Say]]<sup>Rel. Bab 112 ff.</sup> (compare Palmyrene proper name <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נבוזבד‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ברנבו‎</span> [[BDB#Vog|Vog]]<sup>Palm. No. 73</sup>), and this perhaps √ <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***nabû***</u></abbr>, ***call, name***, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נבא‎</span>); — Babylonian god <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּרַע בֵּל קֹרֵם נְבוֺ‎</span> [[Isa.46.1|Isa 46:1]].
